cause.description:
Dont you just hate hearing about people being raped, killed, drownded, well so do I....and woth your help we can stop it, if you know someone who gets really high and drunk and does drugs or talks about wanting to kill someone because of anger, dont keep it to yourelf cal 911 or tell someone, tell a parent, if you do you can help stop our violence in the world....Also Open their eyes to God that can change their lives so much!!!!!
1. USA is suffering from violence.
2. Kelsey Smith has become another victom.:(
3. We need to stop this hatred in the world now!
cause.mission: STOP THIS VIOLENCE IN THE WORLD!
cause.name: Hatrid
